column5: Need new brakes on my 2002 v8 awd explorer. Plan on doing them myself. anyone have a cheap site to order off? So far the best I've found is autopartswarehouse, but my front and back rotor would be 2 different brands cause their out of stock in one. Not sure if that would make a big difference. What pads would you guys recommend? Everyone is telling me ebc greenstuff or hks lts. I know all my stuff when it comes to track cars but couldn't tell ya a think when it comes to pads and towing. My boat fully loaded is prob bit over 2500lbs  Thanks

In the States we have several promo's going on right now...don't know if that helps you but take a look at Advanced Auto...if not RockAuto that I have heard delivers up to Ontario for no extra charge.  http://shop.advanceautoparts.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/home___  http://www.rockauto.com/  For towing "IF" you can get Carbon Metallic pads for your vehicle they are the BEST for stopping power.
if you want to buy in Canada try this place I've done well there http://www.autopartsonlinecanada.com/
